CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Desert relative to Golden Delta?
SRP.A: Sunstone Desert is {below} Golden Delta in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Veridian Plains relative to Sunstone Desert?
SRP.A: Veridian Plains is {above} Sunstone Desert in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Delta relative to Azure Coast?
SRP.A: Golden Delta is {above} Azure Coast in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Veridian Plains}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total housing affordability index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sunstone Desert}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Golden Delta's maximum Housing Affordability Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Golden Delta's maximum Housing Affordability Index is in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Azure Coast's maximum Housing Affordability Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Azure Coast's maximum Housing Affordability Index is in {2015}.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2009, was the average total Housing Affordability Index higher or lower than between 1997 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total housing affordability index between 2002 and 2009 was {lower} than between 1997 and 2009.

NC.Q: Was the total Housing Affordability Index in 1997 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total housing affordability index in 1997 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2012, did the total Housing Affordability Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1991 and 2015?
NC.A: The change in total housing affordability index between 2007 and 2012 was {larger} than between 1991 and 2015.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2015, was the average total Housing Affordability Index higher or lower than between 2006 and 2015?
NC.A: The average total housing affordability index between 1997 and 2015 was {higher} than between 2006 and 2015.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Azure Coast} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Veridian Plains and Sunstone Desert first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Veridian Plains and Sunstone Desert first exchanged leading positions in {1990}.
